verses.text: And the \w Ziphites|strong="H2130"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Doth not \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* himself in the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w Hachilah|strong="H2444"\w*, \add which is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*?

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*, having \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w Hachilah|strong="H2444"\w*, which \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jeshimon|strong="H3452"\w*, by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. But \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* therefore sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w*, and \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in very \w deed|strong="H3559"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w*, and \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of his \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* in the \w trench|strong="H4570"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.\f + \fr 26.5 \ft trench: or, midst of his carriages\f*

Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and to \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Who will go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with me to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*? And \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with thee.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: and, behold, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w sleeping|strong="H3463"\w* within the \w trench|strong="H4570"\w*, and his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w stuck|strong="H4600"\w* in the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* at his \w bolster|strong="H4763"\w*: but \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5462"\w* thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: now therefore let me \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him, I pray thee, with the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* even to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* at \w once|strong="H6471"\w*, and I will not \add smite\add* him the second \w time|strong="H8138"\w*.\f + \fr 26.8 \ft delivered: Heb. shut up\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, \w Destroy|strong="H7843"\w* him not: for who can stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, and be \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w*?

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* furthermore, \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* him; or his \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; or he shall \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* into \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w perish|strong="H5595"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* that I should stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*: but, I pray thee, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thou now the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* that \add is\add* at his \w bolster|strong="H4763"\w*, and the \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* and the \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* from \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w bolster|strong="H7226"\w*; and they gat them \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, and no man \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, nor \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add*, neither \w awaked|strong="H6974"\w*: for they \add were\add* all \w asleep|strong="H3463"\w*; because a deep \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon them.

¶ Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of an \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*; a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w space|strong="H4725"\w* \add being\add* between them:

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and to \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Answerest|strong="H6030"\w* thou not, \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*? Then \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add art\add* thou \add that\add* \w criest|strong="H7121"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, \add Art\add* not thou a \add valiant\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*? and who \add is\add* like to thee in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? wherefore then hast thou not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*? for there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

This \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, ye \add are\add* \w worthy|strong="H1121"\w* to \w die|strong="H4194"\w*, because ye have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* your \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*. And now \w see|strong="H7200"\w* where the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \add is\add*, and the \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that \add was\add* at his \w bolster|strong="H4763"\w*.  +  r 26.16  t worthy to die: Heb. the sons of death *

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w knew|strong="H5234"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* this thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore doth my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* thus \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? for what have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? or what \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

Now therefore, I pray thee, let my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*. If the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have stirred thee \w up|strong="H5496"\w* against me, let him \w accept|strong="H7306"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: but if \add they be\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* they \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for they have \w driven|strong="H1644"\w* me out this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from \w abiding|strong="H5596"\w* in the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.  +  r 26.19  t accept: Heb. smell *  +  r 26.19  t abiding: Heb. cleaving *

Now therefore, let not my \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* before the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w flea|strong="H6550"\w*, as when one doth \w hunt|strong="H7291"\w* a \w partridge|strong="H7124"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: for I will no more do thee \w harm|strong="H7489"\w*, because my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* was \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: behold, I have played the \w fool|strong="H5528"\w*, and have \w erred|strong="H7686"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H7235"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*! and let \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* come \w over|strong="H5674"\w* and \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* it.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* to every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* and his \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* thee into \add my\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but I \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

And, behold, as thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* was much set \w by|strong="H1431"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, so let my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* be much set \w by|strong="H1431"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and let him \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me out of all \w tribulation|strong="H6869"\w*.

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thou, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: thou shalt both \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* \add things\add*, and also shalt \w still|strong="H3201"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*. So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.
